heading: HR00603
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS AND COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE TO CONDUCT A JOINT INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ROLE OF SPECIFIC GOVERNMENT POLICY ACTIONS AND AGENCIES, PARTICULARLY THE NATIONAL TASK FORCE TO END LOCAL COMMUNIST ARMED CONFLICT (NTF-ELCAC), IN THE INCREASING REPRESSION AND HARASSMENT  OF POLITICAL PRISONERS AND THE FURTHER VIOLATIONS OF THEIR RIGHTS
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-12-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00603
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS AND COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE TO CONDUCT A JOINT INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ROLE OF SPECIFIC GOVERNMENT POLICY ACTIONS AND AGENCIES, PARTICULARLY THE NATIONAL TASK FORCE TO END LOCAL COMMUNIST ARMED CONFLICT (NTF-ELCAC), IN THE INCREASING REPRESSION AND HARASSMENT OF POLITICAL PRISONERS AND THE FURTHER VIOLATIONS OF THEIR RIGHTS
